meanings.sent1: After drinking lots of water, the little girl had to go weewee.
meanings.sent2: The toddler had an accident and his weewee soaked through his diaper.
meanings.sent3: The baby giggled as she made weewee in her diaper.
meanings.sent4: The weewee in the potty looked like lemonade.
meanings.sent5: The teacher reminded the children to always flush after using the weewee.

meanings.sent1: During the road trip, Dad had to stop to weewee by the side of the road.
meanings.sent2: The dog weeweed on the fire hydrant during their walk.
meanings.sent3: The cat weeweed in the plant pot instead of the litter box.
meanings.sent4: The athlete had to weewee quickly before the race started.
meanings.sent5: The tree looked greener after the dog weeweed on it.
